channel.title: epicon
channel.description: This website is a virtual proof that I'm awesome

item.title: Meet the research groups
item.description: Who we are - The core of EpiCoN currently includes seven research groups from the Departments of Molecular Biology, Medical Biosciences, Physics, and Medical and Translational Biology. Francesca Aguilo Francesca works on RNA modifications and RNA-based gene regulation of cell fate and breast cancer. [group site] Jan Larsson Jan studies aneuploidies, chromosome-wide gene regulation...
